name: PALoSA-refined
description: PALoSA in a new and improved version

scripts.dev: concurrently --names "Server,Client" --prefix-colors "blue.bold,green.bold" "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.dev-debug: concurrently --names "Server,Client" --prefix-colors "blue.bold,green.bold" "npm run start --prefix server" "npm run start --prefix client"
scripts.install-dependencies: concurrently --names "Server,Client,Root" --prefix-colors "blue.bold,green.bold,red.bold" "npm install --prefix server" "npm install --prefix client" "npm install"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix client && npm run build --prefix server
